column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " We wanted to ask you about that .
#Text=" Aang says : " Did you get a good look at the spirit that took you ?
#Text=" Ding says : " Did n't see no spirit , just felt something come over me , like I was possessed .
#Text=Forced me to start walking toward the mountain .
#Text=I tried to fight it , but I could n't control my own limbs .
#Text=It just about had me into a cave up there .
#Text=And I looked up at the moon for what I thought would be my last glimpse of light .
#Text=But then the sun started to rise and I got control of myself again !
#Text=I just high - tailed it away from that mountain as quick as I could !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why would a spirit want to take people to a mountain ?
#Text=I did hear people screaming under the mountain .
#Text=The missing villagers must still be there !
